org.elasticsearch.painless

Class DefMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.painless.DefMath

  • public class DefMath
extends java.lang.Object
    Dynamic operators for painless.

    Each operator must "support" the following types: int,long,float,double,boolean,Object. Operators can throw exceptions if the type is illegal. The Object type must be a "generic" handler that handles all legal types: it must be convertible to every possible legal signature.
